articles.title: FIFA Will Share in $200 Million Payout From Justice Department - The New York Times
articles.description: Soccer’s governing body and two affiliates in the Americas have been awarded millions after having been classified as victims in a corruption scandal.

articles.title: Possible Havana syndrome case delays Kamala Harris trip to Vietnam - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Havana Syndrome is the name for a rash of mysterious health incidents first reported by American diplomats and other government employees in the Cuba capital beginning in 2016.
articles.content: US Vice President Kamala Harris’ trip from Singapore to Vietnam was delayed several hours Tuesday by an investigation into a possible case of the so-called Havana Syndrome in Hanoi, administration of… [+4784 chars]
